Events that occurred on 15 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien finishes writing a letter to G.E. Selby.
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Arthur Ransome.
1943 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 53a.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 195.
1956 – Linguist Patrick H. Wynne is born.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 281.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien signs three American editions of The Lord of the Rings for Allen.
1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 314.
2001 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 18 is published.
2020 - The Lambengolmor mailing list is closed down.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
